name: Grayish Rainbow
description:
⚙️In your short life you discover that the place where you were born and lived all your life was just a room in a cold, gray laboratory, your name is Kasuca and you are a little blue puffjin with a strange ability that nobody understands it, and your only task is to choose which way to go, the colored door? Or the gray door? ⚙️

"Como tu quer que eu passe disso?" -  Zaras

"Muito dificil :c" -  Beta tester

"Profundo" -  Alguém ai
